TEXT.TITLE: <TRUMP PLAZA> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Net profit 2,529,000 vs loss 1,066,000 Revs 59.0 mln vs 52.6 mln Year Net profit 15.4 mln vs profit 865,000 Revs 247.0 mln vs 231.1 mln NOTE: Company became wholly owned and operated by Donald Trump in May 1986, when he acquired 50 pct interest that had been owned by former operator Holiday Corp <HIA>. Reuter
